section1.subtitle: About Us
section1.content: (EN) This project aims to contribute for an event organized in the Indiana Tijuca community by the residents' association, and it has existed for a few years. This project has always received some help from individual people / donors. It started in 2015 with the arrival of the president of the favela: Maria do Socorro da Silva de Oliveira (who is my mother). My mother who has always been passionate about children, she decided to start organizing themed parties for children and parents. She always worked hard to get financial help to organize these parties and I have witnessed her efforts. </br> I started helping financially in 2018, that year she was having trouble getting all the help she needed. When I noticed what my help could bring, I decided that I should invest more by helping organising this party. </br> Later, for Christmas 2019, I created a Paypal pool that I shared with people around me. In 2019 we had a lot of donations and I noticed how much people were happy to be able to contribute to this. But beyong the poll, I wanted to allow people to see what their contribution has enabled, and that's why we created this website. With this site, we want to publicize the pool but above all, we want to show the photos of the parties that were held and the smile on the face of each child. </br> My name is Rafaela da Silva de Oliveira, I was born in the Indiana Tijuca favela and I lived there until my departure to carry out my studies in France, where I live today. This is where my family lives today and I want to be able to help more and more the people who live there, because they will always be my community and I am very proud to be part of it.

Finally, thank you to Sylvain whose patience and help were essential to make this site a reality!

section3.content: The Indiana Tijuca favela is located in Paul Underberg Street in the Tijuca neighborhood in Rio de Janeiro (Brazil). The community is inhabited by 6000 people today.
